task_description: Predict whether a given story is human-written or AI-generated, i.e., whether the text is written by a human or generated by AI language models.

story.description: The story to be classified as human-written or AI-generated

label.description: Whether the story is AI-generated or human-written

known_hypotheses: **AI-generated texts** exhibit token-level regularity and predictability, leading to lower perplexity scores compared to human writing.
**AI-generated abstracts** consistently contain fewer grammatical errors.
**AI-generated abstracts** exhibit a higher frequency of the same n-grams, especially in higher n-gram ranges.
**Human-written texts** are often more coherent than AI-generated texts, which tend to repeat terms within a paragraph.
**Human-written texts** tend to include spelling errors more frequently, whereas machine-generated texts seldom display these errors.
**Human-written abstracts** display a broader distribution of function words compared to AI-generated counterparts, suggesting differences in writing styles.
